title: 怎么把菜单显示的史蒂夫头改成玩家头

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
2590181518 发表于 2020-1-9 23:13
ChestCommands
例子

headtest:
  ID: skull:3
  SKULL-OWNER: "玩家的名字"
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1

replies.author: WarHawk
replies.txt_content: 什么插件？如果可以设置id试试史蒂夫头的ID.
